Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: As the scheduled vote for the new leader of the Likud draws near, the main contenders, Binyamin Netanyahu, David Levy, Moshe Katzav and Benny Begin, have been making last minute appeals to those in the Likud who will vote for them at the end of this month's internal election.

metadata.label: Title
